EmailTemplate.subject: Seasonal roles with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in working on the 2016 NCS programme with The Challenge! Applications for our 2016 summer programme are now open.
Your profile on the staffing website
As you have already provided us with some of your details, we've gone ahead and done some of the work by creating a profile for you on our staffing website! All you need to do is use the login details below to access the 'My Profile' section to submit your personal details, and then complete the application form.
Username: {!Contact.Email}
Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
You can leave the application form at any time and come back to it later - just remember to 'save' before you exit! The application form can be edited at any point up until submission. After this, the 'My Application' section will be locked while we consider your application.
Click here to login to the staffing website!
Any questions?
If you need more information about the roles on offer, all details and job descriptions can be found here.
If you have specific queries about seasonal roles or the application form, please don't hesitate to contact us on our general helpline: seasonalroles@the-challenge.org. You can also find information on our FAQs page.
We look forward to receiving your application!
Best wishes,
The Staffing Team The Challenge
